entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: CancellationTokens/CancellationTokenSources with reasons and/or custom exceptions #109246
  • `StackOverflowException` for WASM app with `tail.` instruction #109245
  • .net core TLS server certificate with private key in TPM #109243
    Future
  • Assembly::Load crashes C++/CLI app in try block with 9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 #109242
  • Missing OperationCanceledException in .NET 6 #109239
  • The type initializer for 'NetSecurityNative' throws meaningless exception rendering corrective action impossible. #109236
  • ILAsm versions 6.0 or higher force the strong name signed corflag which conflicts with sn test signing #109227
    10.0.0
  • Cleanup `NET8_0_OR_GREATER` symbol #109226
  • how to ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance and ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory() use KeyedService? #109223
  • [mono] AOT-llvm arm64 Performance runs crashing since 2024/09/30 #109220
  • BlockingCollection can get back to uncompleted state even after `IsCompleted` was true #109217
  • [mono] bug about sgen `check-remset-consistency` check #109215
  • Missing ref modifier in COM method call does not throw compilation error but results in empty output parameter #109214
    Future
  • Application Build with sdk .NET9 rc-1 and .NET9 rc-2 were not working in Azure app service(Linux) #109212

Closed

  • ILAsm versions 5.0 or higher fail when given a res file generated by ILDasm #109225
    10.0.0
  • Dependency Injection fails to resolve dependency when using Primary constructor with "in" keyword #105924
    10.0.0
  • Runtime repo signing is broken inside the VMR #109178
  • Runtime thread names #34276

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ManagedThreadBase_FullTransition/NoADTransition distinction #109249
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix typo `commmon` -> `common` #109248
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Define __assume on unix #109247
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix unhandled exception test for composite r2r case #109244
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update all devcontainers to noble #109241
    area-Meta
  • Use floating tag for webassembly image #109240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix servicing version of Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #109238
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • JIT: empty array enumerator opt #109237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109234
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary unsafe keywords #109231
    area-System.Collections
  • [cdac] Implement `IXCLRDataProcess::GetTaskByOSThreadID` #109230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Conditionally check the compiler flags in libs.native #109228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix naot-llvm abi #109224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Factor LibraryImports in `System.Transactions.Local` to Common\ #109222
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Update ThunkGenerator to handle multi-nested classes #109210
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: enable devirtualization/inlining of other array interface methods #109209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check for boxes in fgAddrCouldBeNull #109208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Cleanup `NET6_0_OR_GREATER` #109229
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Ship the minipal as a separate static lib to avoid circular dependencies #109233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update host test RID fallbacks to include arm64 #109235
    area-Host
  • Cleanup NET8_0_OR_GREATER ifdef in json converters #109176
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Expose additional JIT metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate LCL_ADDRs into natural loops #109190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `MethodDesc::GetSig` #109211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move `Intrinsic` generation to use the transient code gen for `CopyConstruct`. #109129
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix superpmi.py tpdiff report generation #109216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forward the ForceDryRunSigning variable down to the runtime inner build #109206
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update `wellknownattributes.h` #109191
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable some red tests for crossgen2 and associate with issue URLs #109204
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Linux/arm: LSRA resolution issues #109173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration, 10.0.0
  • Fixed dependency injection event source tests randomly failing. #107465
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Factor LibraryImports into Common\ for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #109196
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] fix the building error for "PalInterlockedCompareExchange128" #108364
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix stack overflow in compiler-generated state #109207
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • FileShare change to ReadWrite #109104
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement RhGetCommonStubAddress ? #2735
  • browser-wasm - System.TypeLoadException: Could not load type 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.MemoryMarshal' #2731

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Merge oct 01 24 #2734

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to 24 sep 24 #2730
  • Pin Mac Catalyst workload version to 17.5.9270-net9-rc1 #2733
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBinding] Made the node reducer completely static #2729
  • Add `restore-toolset` script for publishing pipeline #2732
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44443

Closed

  • [Linux]There are some warnings "Warning: Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload pack 'Microsoft.NET.Runtime.Emscripten.Node.net8' in manifest ..." when running "dotnet workload update" in CMD after installing SDK 8.0.400 and SDK 9.0.100-preview.7 #42667
  • [WebToolsE2E] Install .NET SDK 9.0 RC2 +.NET SDK 9.0 RTM, the templates version is not replaced by higher versions. #44180
  • Expand platform/architecture coverage for tests running in PR builds #43916
    9.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Re-enable VMR signing #44437
    untriaged, Area-VMR, 10.0.1xx
  • Add *.props and *.targets to XML section of .editorconfig template #44441
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Promote Ubuntu_Offline_MsftSdk SB leg to lite configuration #44453
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove net2.1 targets for test that's failing sometimes #44442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Backport: add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools (#39268) #43060
    Area-Tools, 9.0.2xx
  • [ADD] dotnet solution migrate (draft) #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bulk "Use auto property" skips things that it can refactor individually #75634
  • Refactoring shows doubled "Preview, fix all in" links #75633
  • "Make Method Async" is not update interface correctly. #75626
  • `readonly` modifier recommended on non-fields inside non-struct types #75625

Closed

  • Old Unresolved Issues Closed and Locked: Is This the Right Approach? #75638
  • Nested for loop increment variable defaults to i #38210
    Backlog
  • C#: cdoes not work #65378
    Backlog
  • Introduce-parameter has to be deprioritized #65186
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense doesn't recognize auto-generated classes in referenced project #65044
    Backlog
  • Quick Actions-Slider does not match the content #64065
    Backlog
  • ShadowCopyAnalyzerAssemblyLoader should deduplicate assemblies #63820
    Backlog
  • API needed for accessing project context name #63597
    Backlog
  • Cross Project Add Using Broken For Types Generated By Source Generators #52184
    Backlog
  • Source generator output files list is unreliable/bugged #51810
    Backlog
  • CompilerVisibleItemMetadata/build_metadata missing from source generator invocation in VS #50428
    Backlog
  • I am PowerShell repo maintainer and I want to share a related feedback. #49417
    Backlog
  • Revert workaround for AsyncSemaphore disposal problems #19042
    Backlog
  • GeneratedRegex Attribute Failed to generate code and shows CS8795 error #65850
    Backlog
  • Keywords in the completion list: foreach as a keyword and as a snippet? #64967
    Backlog
  • New rename UI stops updating the editor state when the textbox is fully cleared #64674
    Backlog
  • NFW reduction in external and internal releases #64550
    Backlog
  • Telemetry to measure configuration switch actions in the language service #64547
    Backlog
  • Code fix for WRN_ImplicitCopyInReadOnlyMember #34649
    Backlog
  • Auto formatting a file from outside the solution removes necessary usings #28973
    Backlog
  • Display inherited documentation as an adornment #69789
    Backlog
  • Can completion items with type/template params fill in <> and hold cursor in between the brackets? #69754
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense in typeof doesn't add angle brackets #8318
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] CStr(CUInt(1.5)) is not redundant conversion #61429
  • Distinguish classification between built-in types, boolean values and other keywords #66331
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense incorrectly hard-selects `struct` after `record` #69537
    17.8 P4
  • csharp_style_pattern_matching_over_as_with_null_check incorrect results near labels and goto statements #65609
    18.0
  • Add `Use pattern matching` diagnostic for list patterns #66388
    Backlog
  • Missing import discovery crash #68789
    17.8 P4
  • Flaky tests - Service hub cancellation #65999
    Backlog
  • Highlight references under cursor only if fully selected #67408
    18.0
  • IDE0072: Add missing cases to enum takes extremely long time for enums with many values. #65937
    18.0
  • Make ExternalAccess.FSharp multi-target so it can be used by VSMac #66951
    18.0
  • Battery/power save mode #68580
    Backlog
  • Unhandled exception. System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Runtime, Version #65624
    18.0
  • Inheritance margin tests break when enabling "Frozen Partial Semantics" in OOP. #67065
  • Renaming a variable name has issue in new version of Visual Studio #68273
    17.8 P4
  • CI test failure: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Rename.RenameEngineTests+VisualBasicConflicts.RenameAttributeFromUsage #68073
    17.8 P4
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException while renaming #65798
    17.8 P4
  • F12 for navigating to method body doesn't work #68431
    17.8
  • Have CodeLens References Window Use Find-All-References window instead #68515
    18.0
  • Completions in VB method declaration interfere with smart break line #67624
    17.8 P4
  • Consider displaying preview APIs differently #65915
    Backlog
  • Add `=` for property completions inside initializers #65130
    Backlog
  • Source Generator files are being generated, are valid, can be navigated to but are marked as "not found" by the IDE #67573
    18.0
  • LSIF generator should have a stable, well-defined set of consumer + customer-facing requirements #67385
    18.0
  • LSIF generator should be self-contained/self-bootstrapping #67389
    18.0
  • IDE0004 unhelpful suggestions #64945
    17.8
  • Integrate `dotnet format` in Visual Studio #67399
    Backlog
  • Can't trigger inline method from the method itself, and inlining can break compilation #68874
    17.8 P4
  • The LSIF generator should emit warnings if the binlog is skipping projects #68692
  • Outputting hover information consumes a huge amount of the LSIF indexing time #68691
  • The LSIF generator should allow for a per-document timeout #68690
  • Limit code analysis suggestions to changed code only #68735
    17.8 P4
  • foreach Convert to LINQ produces incorrect code #68729
    17.8 P4
  • Add using tried adding a nonsensical extern alias in interactive #65294
  • Expose MoveToNamespace action in code fixes #68853
    Backlog
  • Analyzer "Apply unused value preferences" doesn't produce working code in VB with option Strict On #68877
    Backlog
  • Consider having a threshold to choose between list/array vs dictionary for lookup #68946
    Backlog
  • wrong namespace removal proposal when declaring a variable the the namespace-name later #68972
    17.8 P4
  • Intellisense won't show event names in VB.NET #68976
    17.8 P4
  • IntelliSense allocates large symbol arrays (LOH) #69004
    17.8 P3
  • Documentation for options of code-style rules is incorrect/misleading #69056
    17.8 P4
  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync method does not return, waits forever #69178
    17.8 P4
  • Rename tracking crashes if the symbol disappears after the session is started #69139
    17.8 P3
  • autocomplete trashing variable names #69154
    17.8 P3
  • Add an option to disable Preview Changes dialog for FixAll command #69180
    Backlog
  • Inline hints errors when cut/paste .cs file #69341
    August
  • Inline hints errors when cut/paste .cs file #69342
    August
  • Inline hints errors when cut/paste .cs file #69343
    August
  • IDE0022 suggestion: option to ignore methods with where clause #69310
    Backlog
  • XML documentation ignored when generated by an external tool #69204
    17.8 P3
  • LSIF generator tool should have some build time performance and reliability quality gate #69068
  • [Project template] Blank line is not preserved after namespace when file has usings #59719
    Backlog
  • Calling SyntaxGenerator.Declaration on an explicit interface indexer implementation generates the wrong result #69284
  • Merging CodeStyle and Features layers #69077
  • IDE doesn't suggest upgrading LangVersion when emitting error as warning #69228
    Backlog
  • Inline type hints cannot be triggered by shortcut #68554
    Post GA
  • Project system error randomly on `ActionBlockSlimAsync` #68584
    Post GA
  • Incorrect Override Suggested By "Generate overrides..." Refactoring #68994
    Backlog
  • Visual Basic does not support "Surround-With" snippets #53836
  • class schema, class namespace wrongly composed and indented in Visual Studio 2022 #68920
  • Optimize SourceText.CalculateChecksum by leveraging System.IO.Hashing #68700
  • The "Add missing using directives on paste" option doesn't respect global usings #68884
  • 'VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. Show Stack Trace Enable Enable and ignore future errors #48702
    Backlog
  • When git is pulled, the code prompts an error #68202
  • [BUG] Go to implementation does not work on interface methods and LSP becomes unresponsive/broken #68649
  • Goto Definition goes to [from metadata] view when target project is SDK and has AssemblyName set #37011
    Backlog
  • Sort properties of a class through the solution manager and apply to the project code. #47451
    Backlog
  • #line pragma false-positive error #68543
  • Show generic collections in IntelliSense #59920
    Backlog
  • Feature 'Fully qualify' is current unavailable due to internal error #68443
  • IDE0063 doesn't identify "simple using statement" in top-level expressions #68285
    Backlog
  • Intellisense "contains" not working fine! #68188
    17.7
  • VB.Net Pretty listing (reformatting) of code changes floating point number #68323
  • Imrpove Intellisense replacement logic #68124
  • Enhanced new class creation #68123
  • Highlight exit points (C#, C++) #60634
    Backlog
  • In Intellisense, Parameter Descriptions Set to inheritdoc Concatenate Together #61466
  • CI test failure: Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicEncapsulateField.EncapsulateThroughLightbulbIncludingReferences #67981

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider.ComputeDifference #75639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't show C# on-the-fly-doc for namespace symbols #75637
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add tests for `unmanaged` constraint #75629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ref safety analysis of captured locals #75627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • See if increasing publish timeout helps signed build issues #75624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't allocate while walking a NormalizedSnapshotSpanCollection during classification tagging #75631
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change from ArrayBuilder => SharedPools for pooling inside AddBracePairsAsync #75630
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue in PatternMatcher code where it was using a caseInsensitive index #75621
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Propagate spread suppression #75596
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow the client to update the server logging level dynamically #75615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Match short lowercase substrings in pattern matcher #68383
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Decouple Workspace.Dispose #48068
    Area-IDE
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ref analysis of self-assignment #75618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WriteAsJsonAsync doesn't write to the response body when used inside a RequestTimeoutPolicy of the RequestTimeoutsMiddleware #58643
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #58638
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #58637
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json #58636
  • Perf improvement: https #58635
  • input type="password" component not able to get data from variable. #58634
  • `FromKeyedServices` Causes Generated Code to Fail to Compile #58633
  • Pre DOM patch event listener in Blazor SSR #58630
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Provide an option for Blazor server to create a nonce for the at runtime by the framework dynamically created inline css styles #58629
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Dynamic Loading of Blazor Component in WEB Forms .NET Framework 4.8 #58626
  • .Net 9 Blazor Server doesn't find components in interactive mode #58625
  • Swagger grpc throws stack overflow exception when having trees as query parameters #58624
  • [SignalR] Connection Fails to Consume Ping Messages, Leading to Disconnect When Configuring HttpMessageHandlerFactory #58623
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, json_middleware, plaintext #58620

Closed

  • Web app fails to load when waiting asynchronously inside an IHostedService #58578
  • Decreasing the window size below the amount of data sent can prematurely abort the connection #47452
    10.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: json #58611
  • Perf regression: json_spring #58621
  • How do you increase the startup time on IIS #58628
  • Bump MessagePack patch version to resolve CVE-2024-48924 (for multiple packages) #58627
  • Blazor WebAssembly: Unable to use sync-imported javascript modules #58622
  • [9.0.100-rc.1.24406.1] EasyCMS app launch failed with 'Multiple constructors accepting all given argument types have been found in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.CookiePolicy.CookiePolicyMiddleware' exception #57231
    .NET 10 Planning
  • GenerateStaticWebAssetEndpointsManifest - An Item with the same key has already been added #57992

PullRequests

Created

  • Always use --apply-cop-headers in ThreadingAppTest #58642
    area-blazor
  • Unskip 6.9.2 #58641
    area-networking
  • Fully Qualify Type Names When Resolving in RDG #58640
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • use JsonSerializerOptions.Web #58631
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Use FullName in InstallJdk script #58618
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • if actual bytes to be written is negative, set to zero #58575
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58510
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
  • [release/2.3] Update EF Submodule to 2.3 #58613
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expander is destroyed when wrapped within Border with Shadow #25537
  • Application crash on setting icon on toolbar item #25534
  • A Grid in a ListView - Why won't it render properly in Android? #25533
  • sign in to apple give authentication service unavailable in visual studio 2022 #25531
  • [ci] New templates failing on signing #25525
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Issue/Question about Custom URL Scheme Activation on .NET MAUI (Android): System.InvalidOperationException #25524
  • [Windows] The screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage. #25518

Closed

  • Existing TextDecorations applied to a Label are not removed when a new TextDecoration value is set after the Label's Text has been modified #16967
    Backlog
  • First debug #25358
  • Maui programs on Windows and Android do not access sites and url #23011
  • App isn't responding #25519
  • iOS development blocked by "Service Unavailable" error #25520
  • Unable to customize scrollbar on ListView #25415

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ignore Other Global Query Filters during OnModelCreating #34986
  • Preprocessing normalization does not visit recursively for normalized Any/All #34984
    10.0.0
  • Attempts of returning DbSet.Local entities instead of requesting a database if possible. #34983
  • Cosmos: review cast/convert handling #34982
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite.NetTopologySuite ERROR: System.ArgumentException: shell is empty but holes are not #34981
  • Issue Running EF Core Migration Bundle in .NET SDK Container Image on Linux Debian (WSL2) #34979
  • EF Core - SQLClient includes all columns from a joined table in the SQL query, even when only one field is explicitly selected #34980
  • ToListAsync returns wrong amount of rows when using TemporalAll and list projection #34978

Closed

  • When is "order by" generated in the underlying sql command text #34971
  • Not using updated ConnectionString #34961
  • Query: unexpected data for queries using (number + fixed_length_string) due to type inference #31917
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Recursively visit when normalizing Any/All to Contains #34985

Merged

  • [TINY/CLEANUP] enabling test for scenario that was fixed earlier #34975

Updated

  • Update .Sources package reference #34973
  • Return the default schema for owned entity types when not mapped to the same table as the owner. #34974

entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #20216
